Nightviper stopped and his optics focused... his cobra abilities were 
tied to his robotics so his vision could catch movement from a 
distance... "The air ssseemsss disssturbed, maybe sssheilds on the 
main bassse, but there ssseemsss to be only one guard..." "Ssshall I 
attack my commander?"
***********************

Rave grumbled now bored... the bioscan had turned out to be a burnt 
engine ruin that came from the destroyed half of the ship... "Come on 
pred heads, bring it on!"
